alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 21 at 12:42PM MST until November 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM WEDNESDAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow, moderate to heavy at times. Storm total snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches in the mountain-valleys and , except 6 to 11 inches in the mountains above 7000 ft MSL. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph at times resulting in blowing snow. * WHERE...Central Idaho mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM Wednesday to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous road conditions that may impact travel at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
